languages.text: "Если бы ты только ведал{mf||а}, сколь мощное и устрашающее оружие ждет там, внизу! С ним мы заставим весь Простор..."
"If only you knew what powerful weapon awaits us down below! With it, we will make the entire Expanse—"
languages.original_text: "Если бы ты только ведал{mf||а}, сколь мощное и устрашающее оружие ждет там, внизу! С ним мы заставим весь Простор..."

traits.locale_text: "If only you knew what powerful weapon awaits us down below! With it, we will make the entire Expanse—"
traits.speaker: Kunrad_FH

traits.locale_text: "If only you knew what powerful weapon awaits us down below! With it, we will make the entire Expanse—"

traits.locale_text: "If only you knew what powerful weapon awaits us down below! With it, we will make the entire Expanse—"

languages.text: “如果你知道下面有多么强大的武器在等着我们就好了！有了它，我们就可以让整个科罗努斯扩区……”
languages.original_text: "If only you knew what powerful weapon awaits us down below! With it, we will make the entire Expanse—"

traits.locale_text: “如果你知道下面有多么强大的武器在等着我们就好了！有了它，我们就可以让整个科罗努斯扩区……”
traits.speaker: Kunrad_FH

languages.text: « Si vous saviez ce qui nous attend là-dessous ! Avec une arme aussi puissante, nous ferons des Étendues de Koronus... »
languages.original_text: "If only you knew what powerful weapon awaits us down below! With it, we will make the entire Expanse—"

traits.locale_text: « Si vous saviez ce qui nous attend là-dessous ! Avec une arme aussi puissante, nous ferons des Étendues de Koronus... »
traits.speaker: Kunrad_FH

languages.text: 「この下にどんなパワーウェポンが眠っているかも知らないくせに！それさえあれば、エクスパンス全域を…」
languages.original_text: "If only you knew what powerful weapon awaits us down below! With it, we will make the entire Expanse—"

traits.locale_text: 「この下にどんなパワーウェポンが眠っているかも知らないくせに！それさえあれば、エクスパンス全域を…」
traits.speaker: Kunrad_FH

languages.text: «¡Si tan solo supieras el poder del arma que nos espera abajo! Con ella, haremos que toda la Extensión...».
languages.original_text: "If only you knew what powerful weapon awaits us down below! With it, we will make the entire Expanse—"

traits.locale_text: «¡Si tan solo supieras el poder del arma que nos espera abajo! Con ella, haremos que toda la Extensión...».
traits.speaker: Kunrad_FH

languages.text: "Wenn Ihr nur wüsstet, welche mächtige Waffe uns unten erwartet! Damit werden wir die gesamte Ausdehnung ..."
languages.original_text: "If only you knew what powerful weapon awaits us down below! With it, we will make the entire Expanse—"

traits.locale_text: "Wenn Ihr nur wüsstet, welche mächtige Waffe uns unten erwartet! Damit werden wir die gesamte Ausdehnung ..."
traits.speaker: Kunrad_FH

languages.text: "Aşağıda ne denli kudretli bir silahın bizi beklediğini bir bilsen! O silah sayesinde Englinlik'in tamamına..."
languages.original_text: "If only you knew what powerful weapon awaits us down below! With it, we will make the entire Expanse—"
